website_summaries.verdict: This belt makes our shortlist because it has it all, from features to craftsmanship to design, all at a mid-range price.
pros: Twelve spacious pockets feature two rustproof hammer compartments and rounded side pockets for added comfort
cons: It runs slightly large, but this is a minor concern

customer_reviews.title: Large, heavy, love it
customer_reviews.text: Positives: Large capacity, tough, durable. Negatives: Heavy, bulky Notes: I like carrying lots of things, and don't mind a little weight/bulk, so it works great for me. It's tough enough to carry sharp objects (sheet rock screws, exposed knife, ...). I'm rough on things, but after laying on it on my roof, catching on things, banging into edges, its holding up. I have a 36" waist - I'm on the 2nd to tightest belt hole. Wouldn't recommend for under 34", but could go much higher. I added a hair tie to hold the extra belt end from flapping around.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Mile long belt!
customer_reviews.text: The belt itself is very nice and durable looking. The pockets are good sizes as well. The only thing about it is the belt. It is a mile long, and there is only a few holes to adjust it to. After you put it in one of the holes, the belt is just hanging there flapping with no extra loop to put it in. If you want to adjust it, you would have to cut the belt.
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve owned!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these to go around the stump under my anvil. Went on a MAD comparison search, about 20 hours, decided on these. I could NOT be happier! They are SUPER rugged, heavy leather and shockingly well made! I can’t see these ever tearing or wearing out, even if I wore it in construction all day, every day, for years. Cool color too. Once they fade a little and break in, PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: sherry ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great construction and quality!! I'm impressed with this work belt. Bought it from warehouse deals and it had a long scratch, annoying, but the quality was so good I couldn't complain. My dad got it as a gift and was totally impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: hm86

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband and he was pleased with the quality and the number of pockets. The leather is nice. Makes a very nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This belt is a great quality leather belt. This is a great value. The sturdy genuine hide will last a very long time. *We are not professional contractors, but DIYers for home projects etc. I expect this will last for many many years for our uses.
customer_reviews.author: Swan

customer_reviews.title: tool belt
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Son-inLaw. He loves it . Nicely made with lots of pockets
customer_reviews.author: Oregon G-Ma

customer_reviews.title: He has used it working construction every day for a year now and it's still in good shape. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves this. Not too bulky, not too small. He said make sure you get suspenders so you don't kill your lower back. He has used it working construction every day for a year now and it's still in good shape. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NurseRatchet

customer_reviews.title: After two weeks of use the leather pockets began to ...
customer_reviews.text: After two weeks of use the leather pockets began to tear. This after I exchanged a different Task belt after the a rivet broke. Unfortunately I am unable to return the item for some reason. I won't be purchasing a task product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this apron
customer_reviews.text: I really like this apron. Like many, I started with a cheap synthetic apron, but as is often the case those just don't hold up or feel as nice as the leather ones. This has been working great, and I fully expect it will last a long time; it has the feel of a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Clever Name Goes Here

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty work belt. Should last for many years. I would prefer that pouches slid on and off belt and not be riveted to it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: ... for my husband he loves it and he looks like a pro doing my hunny do list
customer_reviews.text: is really well made i got it for my husband he loves it and he looks like a pro doing my hunny do list ;)
customer_reviews.author: ClairM

customer_reviews.title: my nephew loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something else when I came across this tool belt. I bought this for my nephew this past Christmas as a surprise gift, and he absolutely loves it!!!!!! Very happy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mindy j

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit big
customer_reviews.text: I'm exactly a 31 waist. It's a bit big so I need to wear suspenders with them. Wish they would have made it an inch smaller or so. What do all contractors have 32 inch waists and bigger? Great belt tho. Wish it fit...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Belt had many links in it depending on your size it should fit just about anyone
customer_reviews.text: Great belt good quality material, only issue is my box cutter falls threw the holder in the belt a little but other then that can’t beat it for the price and quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid apron
customer_reviews.text: Not for a small person these are for 36” waist and above
customer_reviews.author: Danny Marcil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for your man
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my husband and he loves it. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Cindy VanDuzen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave it for a gift. I looked at a lot of them and this had what I was looking for. I was very pleased with the quality and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ahurani

customer_reviews.title: Great for Individual Handywork
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas/Birthday present for my husband, and he loves it! The belt is long enough that it will fit most everyone. The pockets make it useful when you are working on a project by yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Parrott

customer_reviews.title: Task Tools T77265 Carpenter's Apron, Oil-Tanned Split with Leather Belt,...
customer_reviews.text: Task Tools T77265 Carpenter's Apron, Oil-Tanned Split with Leather Belt - got this for my husband's b'day and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Queen

customer_reviews.title: very nice belt. Would love to give it five stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice belt. Would love to give it five stars, but with a 36" waist there's still a bunch of loops left in the belt. Super big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband absolutely loved this tool belt I bought for him
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loved this tool belt I bought for him. He's had no issues with it at all and he uses it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Tellie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Its note a good tool belt already is no good falls apart.DONT BUY
customer_reviews.author: william higgs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I showed it to my boss today and now he wants one...Christmas isn't too far off :-)
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dougan

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The belt is quite large but good quality and a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Rold

customer_reviews.title: not what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The bags were pop riveted onto the belt making it unable to fit in the correct position for my body
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gossett

customer_reviews.title: Good, tough medium size tool belt.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good medium size tool belt for the weekend warrior. It's sturdy and has the right number and size of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: jaselchow

customer_reviews.title: there is still a good 18" of extra belt that has to get tucked ...
customer_reviews.text: Built well and leather seems to be decent quality. The only real downer is that the I have a 36 waist and even though the descriptions says this belt is a 34, the length of the belt is a little absurd. Even after using the 3rd or 4th hole in, there is still a good 18" of extra belt that has to get tucked somewhere. I only wear it occasionally so it's not that big a deal but I imagine that if I had to take this thing on and off multiple times on a daily basis I would not be super enthusiastic about it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Comfortable, Handy
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a surprise for my husband. I did not know that this was the one he had been looking at. He loves it. It is good quality and rugged. The pockets and holders are well-placed and sturdy. The belt has plenty of room for most-sized people to wear and be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Lady

customer_reviews.title: Initial impression was this was well built. Time and a little use (very little) proved otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: The belt is huge. So are the pockets (which is a plus). I am a big guy and there was plenty of room left on the belt. Using a buckle required putting it on in front and rotating around the back. But last night, the front left pocket ripped. On closer inspection, it looks dry and aged after only a few weeks. For the 4 weeks I owned it, it was used only on the weekends. Just 3 days after the 30 day warranty expired, it failed. :(. I will not be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Shellenbarger

customer_reviews.title: nice quality just like the old school ones
customer_reviews.text: good quality reminds me of the old ones i used to use when I when i was a helper as teenager. These days I like people to know where the product is made and this on is made in India
customer_reviews.author: RoyM2

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy duty tool belt with plenty of pouches to replace my last one.
customer_reviews.text: This tool apron has a heavy leather belt that should not break. My last tool apron had a plastic snap-lock that eventually broke; however, the plastic snap was quicker to fasten. The only negative on this tool apron is that it should have the T-square holder on the left side; not the right side. All tool aprons I have purchased for the past 30 years had the T-square holder on the left side.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E Troyer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality pouch
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pouch. Should last well. Only gripes are that the front pockets are a little small making it tight to grab your chalk line or tape measure. Could be a bit bigger! Also the pencil holders are a bit loose and loosen up quickly. Missing a pry bar holder on the left hand side and the knife holder on the right is a bit big/loose. Will try a different pouch next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan W Marling

customer_reviews.title: Leather Tool Belt
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tool belt for my husband for Christmas and he was very happy with it! I think it is a good price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Mallard

customer_reviews.title: Nice quallity
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband. He likes it, a lot. But doesn't love it, as things fall out of the pockets. It's a great quality but he's not about to season it like a baseball mitt, and that would really help. Great gift for a younger guy who will over the years soften it up. We chuckled that maybe it will be compliant by the time my husband croaks. He said it would be something to pass down. Which yea, it will be. :)
customer_reviews.author: Margma

product_meta.title: Task Tools T77265 Carpenter's Apron, Oil-Tanned Split with Leather Belt, 12-Pocket
product_meta.description:
Task Tools Carpenter's apron is made of durable oil-tanned split leather and features 12 various-sized pockets. It sports a 2-Inch-wide heavy-duty saddle leather belt as well as clever reversed, rounded corner pockets for easy access. There is a roller buckle for comfort and safety and 2 rust-resistant nickel-plated hammer holders.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Task Tools Carpenter's apron is made of durable oil-tanned split leather and features 12 various-sized pockets. It sports a 2-Inch-wide heavy-duty saddle leather belt as well as clever reversed, rounded corner pockets for easy access. There is a roller buckle for comfort and safety and 2 rust-resistant nickel-plated hammer holders.
feature_bullets: Carpenter's apron with reversed, rounded corner pockets
Features 12 various-sized pockets and 2 hammer holders
Made of durable oil-tanned split leather
